title: championship jewels
body: I have all these championship jewels and have no idea what else to do with them i already have the championship icon but have so much jewels left . riot can we turn them into shards or something please.

replies.body:
I'm not aware of any plans for exchanging those jewels for essence or shards. According to [this post](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-), the materials will be removed from your loot inventory on November 8th in an effort to prevent clutter.

Let me know if you have any questions.
but i mean we have them can we do something with them?

You could only craft/upgrade Worlds Icons with them. Nothing else can be done with them.

I hope that clears up the confusion.
